songs.title: Despacito (remix) English
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Luis Fonsi & Daddy Yankee]
Oh! You, you are the magnet and I am the metal
I'm getting closer and I'm putting together the plan
Just by thinking it the pulse is accelerated (Oh, yeah)
Ya, I'm already liking more than usual
All my senses are asking for more
This has to be taken without any hurry

[Chorus: Justin Bieber & Luis Fonsi / Daddy Yankee]
Slowly
I want to breathe your neck slowly
Let me tell you things in my ear
So you can remember if you're not with me
Slowly
I want to undress with kisses slowly
I sign on the walls of your labyrinth
And make your whole body a manuscript
(Upload, upload, upload
Go up up)

[Post-Chorus: Luis Fonsi & Daddy Yankee]
I want to see your hair dance, I want to be your rhythm (Woah, woah)
That you teach my mouth (Woah, woah)
Your favorite places (Favorite, favorite, baby)
Let me surpass your danger zones (Woah, woah)
To provoke your screams (Woah, woah)
And forget your last name

[Verse 2: Daddy Yankee]
If I ask you for a kiss, come, give it to me, I know you're thinking about it
I've been trying for a while, mommy, this is giving and giving
You know that your heart with me makes you bom, bom
You know that baby is looking for my bom, bom
Come, try my mouth to see how he knows you
I want, I want, I want to see how much love fits you
I'm not in a hurry, I want to take the trip
Let's start slow, then wild

[Pre-Chorus: Daddy Yankee & Justin Bieber / Daddy Yankee]
Step by step, soft soft
We are going to stick a little bit
When you kiss me with that skill
I see that you are malice with delicacy
Step by step, soft soft
We are going to stick a little bit
And that beauty is a puzzle
But pa 'mount it here I have the piece
Hears!

[Chorus: Justin Bieber & Luis Fonsi / Daddy Yankee]
Slowly
I want to breathe your neck slowly
Let me tell you things in my ear
So you can remember if you're not with me
Slowly
I want to undress with kisses slowly
I sign on the walls of your labyrinth
And make your whole body a manuscript
(Upload, upload, upload
Go up up)

[Post-Chorus: Luis Fonsi & Daddy Yankee]
I want to see your hair dance, I want to be your rhythm (Woah, woah)
That you teach my mouth (Woah, woah)
Your favorite places (Favorite, favorite, baby)
Let me surpass your danger zones (Woah, woah)
To provoke your screams (Woah, woah)
And forget your last name

[Bridge: Luis Fonsi]
Slowly
This is how we do it down in Puerto Rico
I just wanna hear you screaming, "Oh, Blessed One!"
I can move forever when I'm with you
Dance him!

[Post-Chorus: Daddy Yankee, Luis Fonsi & Justin Bieber]
Step by step, soft soft
We are going to stick a little bit
That you teach my mouth
Your favorite places
(Favorite, favorite, baby)
Step by step, soft soft
We are going to stick a little bit
To provoke your screams (Fonsi)
And forget your last name (D.Y.)
Slowly
